description.translate: In all weathers, the sky seems dark to you but no one ever looks up at you.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Cache fureur\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Par tout temps, le ciel te paraît sombre\"}","{\"text\":\"§7mais personne ne lève jamais les yeux sur toi.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7In all weathers, the sky seems dark to you\"}","{\"text\":\"§7but no one ever looks up at you.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HAS§a2 §7HUN§a1\"}"],color:2302737}}
